did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Jordan Detev collection of media art, 2003.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: CD titled At the dawn of European civilization: the oldest temple of fertility, 6200 years B.C.: interactive film and multimedia by Jordan Detev, 2003. Also includes a color photograph of the donors with their tandem bicycle in 1996.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: CD titled At the dawn of European civilization: the oldest temple of fertility, 6200 years B.C.: interactive film and multimedia by Jordan Detev, 2003. Also includes a color photograph of the donors with their tandem bicycle in 1996.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Rose Goldsen Archive of New Media Art.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: Digital files may not be copied or downloaded without the permission of the Curator and artist(s).

prefercite.p: Jordan Detev Collection of Media Art, #8210. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

odd.head: NOTES
odd.p: English version. Also issued in Bulgarian.
